description: Feel like those holiday pounds never went away? If you think you're stuck with a "slow" metabolism. A metabolism that doesn't seem to let you eat anything at all, much less anything you want. Then you should be happy with what I have to tell you. Your metabolism isn't burning calories at a constant rate. The rate can change and you can help to control it! You can learn how to take the reigns and tighten your grip on weight loss with the How to Boost Your Metabolism ebook. The truth is, no one has as slow a metabolism as you might think. The perfect workout or exercise routine can only help you lose some extra lbs. But there's good news - anyone can speed up their metabolism with this guide! Download a slimmer tomorrow, today!
